name: John H. Nickerson
biography:
Assistant Prof of Ceramics and Design at Colordado State University.  Then, worked as chief designer for Blenko Glass Co starting in 1970-1974
1969 MFA, New York State College of Ceramics Alfred, New York 
    
1964 BA, Montana State University, Bozeman, Montana 
    
  Also attended:  
1965-1966 The Society of Arts and Crafts: Detroit, Michigan 
1966 The School for American Craftsmen: Rochester, NY 
    
1976-1977 Artist in Residence Kanawha County Continuing Education Program Kanawha County Continuing Education Program Charleston, West Virginia 
 
1974-1975 Associate Master of design, drawing, sculpture, Ceramics and glass Georgian College of Applied Art and Technology, Barrie, Ontario, Canada
 
1970-1974 Designer in Residence Blenko Glass Company Blenko Glass Company, Inc.; Milton, West Virginia
 
1969-1970 Assistant Professor of ceramics and design Colorado State University; Fort Collins, Colorado
 
1967 Staff Designer Shuron- Continental, Division of Textron Corporation; Rochester, New York
